# Codex CLI Skills

## Overview

Codex skills are defined in `skills/` directories and are preferred over custom prompts.

## Locations

Skills can be loaded from team configuration roots, including `.codex/skills` in a repo and
`$CODEX_HOME/skills`.

## Sources

- https://developers.openai.com/docs/codex/skills
- https://developers.openai.com/docs/codex/team-config
